level.text: Penalties for any violations of this chapter shall be imposed pursuant to ยง 3711 of Chapter 37 of this title.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 3161, 3203 (May 22, 1998); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1402 (February 8, 2013); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 11864 (August 16, 2013).
